"Arguably, as great a sports figure as America has ever produced." @GlobeBobRyan calls in to reflect on the life and legacy of the great Bill Russell.

— The game’s greatest rivalry to this day remains Russell and Wilt Chamberlain. Renowned 76ers statistician Harvey Pollack calculated the rivalry 88-74 to Russell head to head. Chamberlain averaged 28.7 points and 28.7 rebounds; Russell averaged 23.7 points and 14.5 rebounds.
